title: Cannot play LoL
body: I need help because my LoL patcher cannot stop crasing, it usually crashes at 99% but now it just crashes randomly.. I need help and quick. Oh and  I have wrote to Riot support, they asked for my logs and I already sent them over the zip file with the logs.

replies.body:
I took a look at your support ticket and it appears you've already been assigned a tech specialist. Since our specialist has access to your system logs for more accurate troubleshooting, I recommend waiting for a reply from the specialist for further assistance.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
